column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Great lunch special for 10.50 you get a soup or salad (small) to start. Then a personal 6 inch deep dish regular
column3: pepperoni plus a drink with refills. Great deal. It's deep dish chicago pizza and definitely different from NYC pizza I am used to. The pepperoni was my favorite moreso than the sausage
column4: but that's personal preference. Typically needs a knife and fork to eat. Nice crust. Crispy and not soft or soggy. Just the right amount of food for a nice lunch to put you into a food coma. Even ice tea was included in the lunch special for a drink.
